channel.title: CVE Feed for WooCommerce Payment Gateway Per Category -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WooCommerce Payment Gateway Per Category -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-38341|2024-09-17T00:15:40.874Z -- woocommerce%20payment%20gateway%20per%20category -- woocommerce%20payment%20gateway%20per%20category
item.description: The WooCommerce Payment Gateway Per Category WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to a reflected $_SERVER["PHP_SELF"] value in the ~/includes/plugin_settings.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 2.0.10.
